text.title: Maintain Mental Health with Exercise

p.s: There is a lot of proof that exercise will benefit your mental health and creativity .
But what are the best exercises for maintaining a healthy mind and body ?
Here are some tips but know that the most important thing is to stay consistent , listen to your body and know what 's best for you .

item.s:
This is the easiest way of exersising , which will not only keep your body moving but also relaxes your mind
Spare around 10-60minutes each day to just wander around the block or a park nearby
Listen to some music or podcasts

text.item:
Jogging .
Light running can free your mind and achieving certain distances can boost your serotonin level , which will keep up your overall happiness
Plan around 10-60minutes each day to jog around the block or in a nearby park
Listen to motivational music or try guided runs via apps
Begin small by starting to run 10minutes and increase it slowly
Do n't push yourself to run a certain distance in a certain time

Cycling .
Just like the previous exercises this one not only improves your stamina but also reliefs your mind from tension .
Get yourself a bike .
It does'nt have to be an overly expensive one
Plan to cycle to work , school or anywhere else
Start slow and organize more time for your ride than the GPS estimates .
This will reduce stress .
Be safe .
Wear a helmet and look out for car drivers , traffic lights and signs .

item.s: Go on a treadmill , stationary bike or stairmaster
Take it easy by setting a low speed or resistance

list.item: Listen to music or podcasts but do n't watch a series or a movie as this will occupy your mind .

item.s: Follow a training plan or routine .
Ask a trainer to help you with a plan perfected for your desired results .
This will help you with motivation to go to the gym .
Use your phone only to listen to music .
Do n't scroll through social media while resting in between laps .
Focus on the exercise , not the surrounding and the people .
This way your mind does't wander and you get trough your exercises more quickly .

list.item:
Yoga .
As stereotypical as it seems yoga is the best way to ground yourself , improve your flexibility and boost your mental health .
With elements similar to meditation it offers deep relaxation while exercising .
Try out a yoga class at your gym .
Most gym memberships include classes such as yoga class .
Look at the schedule and visit one .
You wo n't find scrawny models or grandmas but rather the regular people you see at the gym .
Try guided yoga routines at home .

item.s: Just like yoga it helps you stay connective to your body , control your movement and relax your mind .
Try out a free first lesson to see if it fits you

list.item:
Do n't push your limits and overpower your body while exercising .
Be sure to rest appropriately and do n't be so hard on yourself if you only lift light weights or run slowly .
Your mental health is more important than what others think of you
